title: WeFi
author: WeFi
content: Coinband is a leading marketing agency for Web3 & Crypto & NFT projects. Our company has the cutting-edge client-side expertise to create better solutions for our client's marketing challenges. By cooperating with Coinband, you get access to the best financial and crypto media and influencers. Add to that best practices in content management and the web3 community and you have a complete marketing solution. Which problem do we solve:It's challenging to find a marketing partner with deep expertise in Web3. Coinband is a great solution, with an agency commission, at the intersection of performance and competence. >750 mln. $ capitalization of our clients26+ web3 marketing specialists, to promote your project100.000+ attract new users per month for our customersSubmit an application on our website ðŸ‘‰ https://coinband.io/

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: WeFi on May 27, 2023, 04:18:03 PMWhich problem do we solve:It's challenging to find a marketing partner with deep expertise in Web3.I donâ€™t know if thatâ€™s necessarily true. Every time I tweet on the subject of web3 I get a hundred messages in my inbox from people claiming to be just that and offering a similar service. Do you have any client success stories you can share or examples of a campaign youâ€™ve put on? 100,000 new clients per month seems like a pretty bold claim.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: WeFi on May 27, 2023, 04:18:03 PMCoinband is a leading marketing agencyWhy it read like Coinbase to me? Of course the difference is in se and ndQuote from: WeFi on May 27, 2023, 04:18:03 PM>750 mln. $ capitalization of our clients26+ web3 marketing specialists, to promote your project100.000+ attract new users per month for our customersSubmit an application on our website ðŸ‘‰ https://coinband.io/These claims will sound real if you are able to get some reference and facts behind it. [1] Your website traffic analysis can help[2] Reviews from your previous clients will help too. Don't try to fake it as there are people who are very good to spot fakes.
